stories.text:
- 90% of the best engineers are never actively on the market

- The best time to reach this 90% is when they are open to opportunities, but not actively looking

- Most engineers are not primarily focused on building their network to set themselves up for great opportunities

So every couple of weeks I round up cloud-related jobs from around my network. (Why cloud, specifically? It's what I know, and I find it's more helpful to specialize than generalize.)

I have a few biases for how I put this list together:

• Full-time remote

• AWS, Azure, and/or GCP

• Salary range (where I can get it)

• A mix of junior, mid-level, senior, and leadership roles

• And, most importantly, an inside referral contact for every single job.

Latest issue is here: https://cloudirregular.substack.com/p/the-best-jobs-in-cloud-dec-16-2021
